page.title: 20Computers
page.content: I have a{ZX Spectrum plus computer which has a{48k memory}and it is very good. Before I got the plus I had an ordinary Spectrum with a 48k memory (the only difference is the keyboard) but a boy called Stuart Burt broke it. We took it to{WH Smiths}to be mended, but they had to send it to {Sinclair Research Ltd.}On the way they lost it so they gave us our plus.There are plenty of{games for the plus.}My favourite is called{Transversion.}In the game you are the captain of a {space ship}called Eliminax.You have to fly the ship around the screen{zapping {alien pods}with your{lasers.}There are 150 screens and I have got onto screen 67.My nextdoor neighbours have a{Texas {Instruments}computer. I'm not sure how much memory it has. They are the only two computers in our road on the 21st June, 1985.
